events.message: The insured reported a car collision that occurred early this morning involving their vehicle and a tree. Immediate claim filing was required due to significant damage.
Claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on initial description mentioning vehicle collision and damage to the car.
An agent specializing in auto insurance cases has been assigned to the claim to ensure proper handling and customer support.
Customer has been sent an acknowledgment of their claim submission with assurance on further support and updates throughout the process.
Request for police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates has been sent to the claimant to proceed with investigation.
The claimant successfully submitted all requested documents including the police report, vehicle photos, and mechanic’s damage evaluation.
Investigation team has started reviewing submitted evidence and inspecting the vehicle damage to assess the claim validity.
Investigation concluded confirming the collision caused significant damage covered under the policy with no signs of negligence.
A settlement amount covering vehicle repairs and rental car reimbursement has been proposed to the claimant for acceptance.
The claimant responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the communication and support.
Formal approval of the claim was granted based on investigation findings and agreement on settlement terms.
Payment for the approved settlement amount has been issued and scheduled for transfer to the claimant’s bank account.
The claim file has been officially closed following successful payment disbursement and claimant’s confirmation of settlement receipt.
